original_query: select MIN(p1.toNode) from patents p1, patents p2, patents p3, patents p4, patents p5, patents p6, patents p7 where p1.toNode = p2.fromNode AND p2.toNode = p3.fromNode AND p3.toNode = p4.fromNode AND p4.toNode = p5.fromNode AND p5.toNode = p6.fromNode AND p6.toNode = p7.fromNode

CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E1 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 WHERE E2.FromNode=E1.ToNode)

CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E1E3E4E5E6E7 AS SELECT MIN(FromNode) AS EXPR$0 FROM E2E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E4E5E6E7 WHERE E2E1.ToNode=E3E4E5E6E7.FromNode)
